author: DWW

changelog.release_notes:
- Added Pebble 2 build
 - can now see all temperatures when notification presented (support for obstructed view)

- fixed "N/C", "settings not set" not showing up
 - corrected red background time (before sunset, after sunrise rather than before sunrise, after sunset)

Added build comments, alternative battery for chalk/round
published for chalk/round

- new options:
   date format (UK/US)
   no vibrate on bluetooth loss
   automatic update off
 - current temperature as well as min/max
 - refactor to persist in watch instead of phone so weather not lost when bluetooth lost
 - new APIkey

description:
A simple watchface for daily use, with weather.

Features:
 - 12/24 hour clock
 - UK/US format date
 - battery percentage and coloured status, including charging
 - Bluetooth indicator with optional vibrate on loss of connection
 - Weather, with current condition and temperature, daily high/low temperature (coloured ranges), last updated
 - Celsius/Fahrenheit toggle
 - frequency of automated updates, including off
 - background is blue during the day, black at night and red at sunset/sunrise
 - weather/sunrise/sunset is stored, so even if connection is lost it is still presented (indicated as "N/C" for internet loss).
 - location is manually entered as lat/long so you don't need to rely on the phone establishing location
 - Dark Sky weather API key is limited to 1000 a day - so there is an option to enter your own, created on https://developer.forecast.io/

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added Pebble 2 build
 - can now see all temperatures when notification presented (support for obstructed view)
